posts.title: 如何用Hexo配合Github page搭建个人网站
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick Start Install Hexo 1$ npm install -g hexo-cli Create a project for your GitHub Pages 123$ hexo init githubUserName.github.io$ cd githubUserName.github.io$ npm install Set information to use Git 1$ npm install hexo-deployer-git --save Edit the _config.yml in the main folder, add the following: 1234deploy: type: git repo: git@github.com:githubUserName/githubUserName.github.io.git branch: main Create a new post 1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server 1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files 1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites 1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment 参考网站： 使用hexo上传个人网页到Github Git设置SSH key
